alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 1:53PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Utah and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will also occur at times creating areas of near whiteout conditions. Thunderstorms are also possible and could lead to wind gusts over 55 mph in localized areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
